title: His Seductive Eyes (The Montgomery Boys Book 8)
features: As the oldest of the eight sons in the Montgomery family, it was always my responsibility to look after the younger ones.

That became even more important after our father's death when the ranch came under my control.I had to put my own dreams aside to make sure the ranch kept going.I'd always wanted a family of my own to fill the big house on the ranch, but as busy as my life got, I thought that would never happen.Especially not with our rival family.But I shared a hot kiss with one, and the rest is history.She’s a tough girl, but I’m about to break her in.
If she doesn’t break me first.
description: See what other Amazon readers are saying about His Seductive Eyes...
"An entertaining end to the Montgomery Boys series... sorry to see it come to an end."
The storyline was exciting with lots of danger and drama as well as wonderful chemistry and romance.
"This was an emotional and drama filled book! The chemistry between Cassidy and Robyn jumps off the pages and really turns up the heat! I've enjoyed every book in this series."
My FAVORITE! This book was amazing!
"I'm kind of sad this was the last book, but I can't wait for whatever comes next!!"
